ygData.subject: RE: Changes in spawning
ygData.msgSnippet: Haven t been to LF, but I have noticed a similiar thing in the West Commons. More frequent spawns, ans well as different spawns.  For instance, I have noticed
ygData.messageBody:
Haven't been to LF, but I have noticed a similiar thing in the West Commons.
More frequent spawns, ans well as different spawns. For instance, I have
noticed quite a few more DE NPC's in that area, and have actually been
slaughtered by one of them.


-----Original Message-----
From: Chas Watkins [mailto:cwatkins@...]
Sent: 1999/09/22 1:28 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Changes in spawning


From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>

I have hunted the Shrine in LF a lot and I have noticed a difference their
last night. One the mummies and skeletons (lvl 9-13)have a lot more booty. I
made several plat in an hour. HOWEVER there was a spawn variation last
night. Normally I just take them in rotation and they spawn about every 5
mins. Once last night a 2nd mummy spawned about 10 seconds after I pulled
the first. Has anyone noticed this. Personally I really like the idea as it
changed a "cushy" kill into a near death experience. I look forward to
hearing your thoughts.

Nyne/Nynenom
